title: Getting Started with Your Budget
subtitle: A gentle guide to understanding income, expenses, and categories.
description: A beginner-friendly walkthrough showing how to take your first steps toward building a working personal budget.

title: Zero-Based Budgeting
subtitle: Give every dollar a job.
description: Learn how zero-based budgeting helps you stay intentional and avoid overspending by assigning every dollar a purpose.

title: How to Reduce Your Monthly Bills
subtitle: Cut recurring expenses without sacrificing quality of life.
description: A collection of proven strategies to negotiate bills, reduce subscriptions, and lower regular expenses.

title: Why Most Budgets Fail
subtitle: And how to make yours work.
description: Uncover the common reasons budgets fall apart and learn what mindset shifts can keep you on track.

title: Budgeting for Your First Apartment
subtitle: Avoid common pitfalls when moving out.
description: A practical guide to budgeting for rent, utilities, deposits, and furnishing your first home.
